class.name: TileMap
class.description: Node for 2D tile-based maps. Tilemaps use a [TileSet] which contain a list of tiles (textures plus optional collision, navigation, and/or occluder shapes) which are used to create grid-based maps. When doing physics queries against the tilemap, the cell coordinates are encoded as [code]metadata[/code] for each detected collision shape returned by methods such as [method PhysicsDirectSpaceState2D.intersect_shape], [method PhysicsDirectBodyState2D.get_contact_collider_shape_metadata] etc.

method.name: fix_invalid_tiles
method.description: Clears cells that do not exist in the tileset.

method.name: get_used_cells
method.description: Returns a [Vector2] array with the positions of all cells containing a tile from the tileset (i.e. a tile index different from [code]-1[/code]).

method.name: get_used_rect
method.description: Returns a rectangle enclosing the used (non-empty) tiles of the map.

method.name: map_to_world
method.description: Returns the local position corresponding to the given tilemap (grid-based) coordinates.

method.name: set_cell
method.description: Sets the tile index for the cell given by a Vector2i.

method.name: update_dirty_quadrants
method.description: Updates the tile map's quadrants, allowing things such as navigation and collision shapes to be immediately used if modified.

method.name: world_to_map
method.description: Returns the tilemap (grid-based) coordinates corresponding to the given local position.

members.member: The TileMap's quadrant size. Optimizes drawing by batching, using chunks of this size.

signal.name: changed
signal.description: Emitted when the [TileSet] of this TileMap changes.
